Articles.Content:
After the .25 update I decided to load up the game and it took so long to load. But I thought it was just loading new parts for the first time(silly me). So I ran it again to see and timed it it took 5 minutes and 24 seconds to finish. I think that is ridiculous. Why is it taking so long and how can I if at all fix it.

Commando:(

Edited October 14, 2014 by commando100
How much RAM does your computer have? It may be the case of heavy memory swapping which slows your pc down a lot.
That's enough. Hm... please upload your logs. There might be a clue in them.
I happen to be unable to find the .25 ones in any file but I have the old ones.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

There is a description where they are.

Also make sure you don't have any virtual network devices running (like Hamachi). Apparently there is some bug with Unity causing the load time to take forever.

~Claw

This is an end to this Post since Claw gave me the solution, Hamachi does not play well with KSP therefor it causes lag in loading.

Commando
